WorkItem.Description:
Today, I played around a little bit with my cat gear in Rawr. Doing this, I noticed something rather odd when changing SoE totem from non-imp to imp. version: Enchant Ring - Stats went from 3.62 to 3.98 DPS, which seems rather high, since removing SoE alltogether, it just goes down by 0.04 dps.
Â 
Sorry for my english -.-
WorkItem.Summary: [Cat] Enchant Ring: Stats vs. Striking oddity

Comments.Message: Rawr is more accurate than you're expecting. It's correctly performing the rounding of stats. With Imp SoE, you're at a value of Str where adding a 4str enchant gives you 5str (from Kings). With Unimp SoE or no SoE, you're at a value of Str where adding a 4str enchant gives you meerly 4str.
